column1: Smoque BBQ////While I will concur it is the best in Chicago
column2: I still think it is just good
column3: not great.  The brisket is amazlingly tender
column5: goodness.  It's a sin in my mind to even consider ordering it chopped because of the tenderness.  The memphis BBQ sauce is my favorite.  Carolina BBQ is too vinegary for me
column6: and I'm glad Smoque gives you one of each to decide.  The baby back ribs had great BBQ flavor from the rub
column8: which was disappointing for me considering I had a taste for ribs.
